page.title: 02OUR SCHOOL.
page.content: People travel to our school in lots of different ways.For example, there are people who walk ,cycle and come by car and bus.In the school there are 96 children ageing from 4 to 11 years old. Our headmaster teaches us for all subjects,but he doesn't teach us on Mondays,Tuesday mornings and Fridays. Also there are 3 part time teachers. They include Miss Greenwood, who teaches us on Mondays,Tuesdays and Fridays,Mrs Dell and Mrs Hartley.There are two full time teachers who are Mr. Lee and Miss Camps.We have no hall but we have quite a few sports facilities. We have a swimming pool and we have house points.We have had a computer for less than a year,and we have a library.Our school is quite old and is built of granite.Our hours are 9 to 12 and 1.30 to 3.30.
